messages.content: Can you write a letter of motivation to convince a landlord that we are great guests. We are a couple expecting our first baby. We're both professionals holding long term jobs at the same company for many years, we don't drink or smoke and don't like loud music. We are kind and like to cook and are excited to live together in lille near a park that will be nice for our baby. Write it in a way that would motivate the realtor and the landlord, what might they like to hear. keep it to half a page

Dear [Landlord/Realtor],

We hope this letter finds you well. We are writing to express our sincere interest in renting the apartment you have listed in Lille. As a professional couple expecting our first child, we believe this location is perfect for our family.

We have both been employed by the same company for many years and have established ourselves as reliable and responsible individuals. We have a stable income and can provide references upon request. We do not drink, smoke or indulge in loud music, so you can rest assured that we will be respectful of our neighbors and maintain a peaceful environment.

We are also excited about the opportunity to live near a park, which we believe will be perfect for our little one. We enjoy cooking and look forward to creating a warm and welcoming home. As parents-to-be, we understand the importance of keeping the space clean and tidy, and will always treat the property with the utmost care.

We are confident that we would make great guests, and would love the opportunity to discuss the rental further with you. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or require any additional information.

Thank you for considering our application. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

[Your Names]
